Articles.Content: I'm Canadian. I Spocked 17 fives last year and have a box devoted to Spocked fives. I tried to use one once and got a very strange look from the cashier.
umm can someone tell me what's going on? :/

> 
> umm can someone tell me what's going on? :/

I guess people are drawing on the Canadian five dollar bill to make Sir Wilfrid Laurier look like Spock. (Not everyone is doing it, obviously. I am Canadian and I didn't know about it until I read this thread.)

![o-SPOCK-5-BILL-CANADA-570.jpg](http://i.huffpost.com/gen/1319253/thumbs/o-SPOCK-5-BILL-CANADA-570.jpg)
I thought your cash was plastic. How do you write on it?

> 
> Is that legal?

It is legal, but illogical.

[http://www.usatoday.com/story/money/2015/03/04/spocking-fives-leonard-nimoy-canada/24366807/](http://www.usatoday.com/story/money/2015/03/04/spocking-fives-leonard-nimoy-canada/24366807/)

> 
> I thought your cash was plastic. How do you write on it?

The new bills are made from a plasticy material but there are still older bills in circulation. The "spocked" bill in the image above is an older bill. The new bills look like the one below. They have an image of the ISS' Canadarm on the back which, in my view, is cooler than Spock graffiti.

![11788295744_1a166827ef_b.jpg](https://c2.staticflickr.com/4/3750/11788295744_1a166827ef_b.jpg)
Wow... that's the first time I've seen the new 5... way cool... like it... thumbs up! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Someone needs to open an e-store. Seriously.
That really does not look much like Spock.

> 
> That really does not look much like Leonard Nimoy.

Fixed that for you. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Sadly the Euro bills only show architecture - that does not even exist. \*sigh\*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-05T08:11:26Z" title="03/05/2015 08:11  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 5, 2015</time> by KerbMav**

> 
> It is legal, but illogical.
> [http://www.usatoday.com/story/money/2015/03/04/spocking-fives-leonard-nimoy-canada/24366807/](http://www.usatoday.com/story/money/2015/03/04/spocking-fives-leonard-nimoy-canada/24366807/)

For Vulcans yes but Spock was half Human and he wasn't 100% logical all the time.

> 
> They have an image of the ISS' Canadarm on the back which, in my view, is cooler than Spock graffiti.

No way! Spocking is cooler ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

And spocking shows how cool Canadian folks are. So be proud for that ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Status turns to illegal when a certain degree of the bill is ruined and that depends on the each country's laws, I guess. This is still a minor adjustment ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) of the bill, although more serious than writing a phone number or a name.

This is very cool. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I still yet to Spock my 5! I have a collection of those old $5 bills.

EDIT:

Funny, I have 87 posts and I like the back of the $5 bill since it has all the hockey players and one particular player has the number 9 on the back of their sweater...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-07T22:15:43Z" title="03/07/2015 10:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 7, 2015</time> by CelticCossack51**
Chris Hadfield. He's cool. I met him once.

> 
> Chris Hadfield. He's cool. I met him once.

Photo proof or it is not true. ;-)
I know I'm AWSOME thank you jk ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Photo proof or it is not true. ;-)

He did a Skype Call with my school, so I didn't technically meet him, but I talked to him
